info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 28 at 3:00PM CDT until August 28 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR EASTERN OGLE AND CENTRAL LEE COUNTIES... At 300 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Winnebago to near Ashton to near Woodhaven Lakes, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rochelle, Byron, Oregon, Amboy, Davis Junction, Hillcrest, Stillman Valley, Franklin Grove, Ashton, Lost Nation, Woodhaven Lakes, Creston, Lindenwood, Monroe Center, Steward, Lee Center, Kings and Chana. This includes... Lee County Fairgrounds, Lowden State Park, and Ogle County Fairgrounds. Including the following interstates... I-39 between mile markers 94 and 114. I-88 between mile markers 60 and 82. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
